If.Set: RspMsg=申请主机非会计流水失败!

DynSentence.name: QryLotSysCfg
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT UsrPam,UsrPas FROM lotsyscfg WHERE DealId='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdLotSysCfg
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotsyscfg SET SigTim='%s',LclTim='%s',LotTim='%s',DiffTm='%s' WHERE DealId='%s'

DynSentence.name: ChkCrdCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT count(LotNam) CrdCnt FROM lotcusinf WHERE CrdNo='%s' and Status='1'

DynSentence.name: ChkMobCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT count(LotNam) MobCnt FROM lotcusinf WHERE MobTel='%s' and Status='1'

DynSentence.name: InsCusInf
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO lotcusinf(BrNo,CusNam,CrdNo,ActNo,ActNod,IdTyp,IdNo,MobTel,FixTel,LotNam,LotPsw,RegTim,Email,CityId,SEX,Status) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s')

If.Set: RspMsg=查询客户开卡信息出错

DynSentence.name: ChkCrdCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT count(LotNam) CrdCnt FROM lotcusinf WHERE CrdNo='%s' and Status='1'

DynSentence.name: ChkMobCnt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT count(LotNam) MobCnt FROM lotcusinf WHERE MobTel='%s' and Status='1'

DynSentence.name: UpdCusInf
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotcusinf SET LotNam='%s',MobTel='%s',RegTim='%s' WHERE CrdNo='%s' and Status='1'

DynSentence.name: QryCusInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT LotNam,LotPsw,Email,CityId,IdTyp,IdNo,CusNam,Sex FROM lotcusinf WHERE CrdNo='%s' and Status='1'

DynSentence.name: QryCusInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT LotNam,LotPsw,Email,CityId,IdTyp,IdNo,CusNam,MobTel FROM lotcusinf WHERE CrdNo='%s' and Status='1'

DynSentence.name: ChkLotUser
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT LotNam, CusNam, MobTel FROM lotcusinf WHERE CrdNo='%s' and Status='1'

DynSentence.name: TotPlnNum
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT count(PlanNo) as TotCnt FROM lotautpln WHERE CrdNo='%s' and Status='0'

DynSentence.name: QryPlnMsg
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT PlanNo,PlanNm,MobTel,BetPer,BetLin，BetAmt,DoPer,CAST(BetPer as BIGINT) - CAST(DoPer as BIGINT) LevPer FROM lotautpln WHERE CrdNo='%s' and Status='0'

DynSentence.name: ChkPlnRec
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT 'Y' YN FROM table(values(1)) as annoy WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'Y' FROM lotautpln WHERE PlanNo='%s' and CrdNo='%s' and Status='0')

DynSentence.name: UpdPlnSts
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotautpln SET Status = '0' WHERE PlanNo='%s' and CrdNo='%s' and Status='0'

DynSentence.name: ChkPlnCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT 'Y' YN FROM table(values(1)) as annoy WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'Y' FROM lotplnctl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' )

DynSentence.name: QryPlnCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT TxnSts FROM lotplnctl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s'

DynSentence.name: InsPlnCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO lotplnctl(GameId,DrawId,DrawNm,BetDat,BegTim,EndTim,TxnSts) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: UpdPlnCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotplnctl SET EndTim='%s',TxnSts='%s' WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s'

DynSentence.name: ChkDrwTbl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT 'Y' YN FROM table(values(1)) as annoy WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'Y' FROM lotdrwtbl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' )

DynSentence.name: InsDrwTbl
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO lotdrwtbl(GameId,DrawId,DrawNm,SalStr,SalEnd,CshStr,CshEnd) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: QryAutPln
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT PlanNo,GameId,PlayId,BetPer,BetMet,BetMod,BetMul,BetAmt,BetLin,LotNam,CrdNo,MobTel,CclTim,CurPer,CurFal,ConFal,DoPer,Status FROM lotautpln WHERE Status='0'

DynSentence.name: UpdAutPln
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotautpln SET CurPer='%s',CurFal='%s',ConFal='%s',DoPer='%s',CclTim='%s',Status='%s' WHERE PlanNo='%s' and CrdNo='%s' and LotNam='%s'

If.Set: MsgTxt=STRCAT(购彩系统异常：定投交易终止执行，请检查定投交易485411。)

Else.Set: MsgTxt=STRCAT(购彩系统异常：定投交易终止执行，请检查定投交易485411。)

If.Set: RspMsg=已经超过销售结束时间
MsgTxt=STRCAT(双色球定投执行停止,请检查定时日志485411交易)
RspMsg=调用购彩交易异常,定投停止执行
MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的卡号:,$CrdNo,余额不足，定投购彩不成功！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(对不起，您的账户余额不足。)
MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的定投购彩计划已累计三次购买彩票不成功，对定投计划编号为,$PlanNo,进行撤消！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(对不起，您已连续三次购彩不成功，您的定投将撤销。)

ElseIf.Set: MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的卡号:,$CrdNo,状态不正常，定投购彩第,$DrawNm,期不成功！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(您的账户异常，请拨打95559进行查询。)

If.Set: MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的定投购彩计划已累计三次购买彩票不成功，对定投计划编号为,$PlanNo,进行撤消！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(对不起，您已连续三次购彩不成功，您的定投将撤销。)

ElseIf.Set: MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的卡号:,$CrdNo,已正式挂失，定投购彩第,$DrawNm,期不成功！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(您的账户异常，请拨打95559进行查询。)

If.Set: MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的定投购彩计划已累计三次购买彩票不成功，对定投计划编号为,$PlanNo,进行撤消！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(对不起，您已连续三次购彩不成功，您的定投将撤销。)

ElseIf.Set: MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的卡号:,$CrdNo,已冻结，定投购彩第,$DrawNm,期不成功！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(您的账户异常，请拨打95559进行查询。)

If.Set: MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的定投购彩计划已累计三次购买彩票不成功，对定投计划编号为,$PlanNo,进行撤消！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(对不起，您已连续三次购彩不成功，您的定投将撤销。)

ElseIf.Set: MsgTxtlog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的定投购彩遇到超时，请半小时后查询第,$DrawNm,期购彩是否成功！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(对不起，请求超时，您的本次投注未成功。)
MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：由于您的卡号:,$CrdNo,扣款异常，导致第,$DrawNm,期定投购彩不成功！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(对不起，您本次购彩不成功，请重新操作或拨打95559查询原因。)
MsgTxtLog=STRCAT(尊敬的客户：您的卡号:,$CrdNo,定投购彩业务第,$DrawNm,期投注不成功！)
MsgTxt=STRCAT(对不起，您本次购彩不成功，请重新操作或拨打95559查询原因。)

Else.Set: MsgTxt=STRCAT(购彩系统异常：定投交易终止执行，请检查定投交易485411。)

FlowCtrl.Set: MsgTxt=STRCAT(购彩系统信息：定投交易定投交易485411顺利执行完成！！)

DynSentence.name: QryDrwTbl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT GameId,DrawId,KenoId,FlwCtl FROM lotdrwtbl WHERE (SalEnd <'%s' OR (KSalEd <'%s' AND GameId='7')) AND FlwCtl != '10' AND KenoId !='AAAAA' ORDER BY GameId DESC,DrawId ASC

DynSentence.name: UpdDrwTbl_FlwCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotdrwtbl SET FlwCtl='%s' WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s' and FlwCtl='%s'

DynSentence.name: ChkPrzInf
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT 'Y' YN FROM table(values(1)) as annoy WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'Y' FROM lotprzinf WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s')

DynSentence.name: InsLotPrzInf
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO lotprzinf(GameId,GameNm,DrawId,DrawNm,KenoId, KenoNm,StrTim,StpTim,TotPrz,JacPot, OpnTot,OpnNum,BonCod,ClsNum,ClsNam, BonAmt,BonNum) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: ChkLotPrzCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT 'Y' YN FROM table(values(1)) as annoy WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'Y' FROM lotprzctl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s')

DynSentence.name: InsLotPrzCtl
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO lotprzctl(GameId,DrawId,KenoId,Cipher,BigBon, TotPrz,TxnLog,TLogNo,TermID) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s','%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: InsLotPrzDtl
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO lotprzdtl(GameId,DrawId,KenoId,TxnLog,TLogNo, BetMod,BetMul,Class,PrzAmt,BetLin) VALUES('%s','%s','%s','%s','%s', '%s','%s','%s','%s','%s')

DynSentence.name: ChkLotAwdDtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT 'Y' YN FROM table(values(1)) as annoy WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'Y' FROM lotawddtl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s')

DynSentence.name: InsLotAwdDtl
DynSentence.Sentence: INSERT INTO lotawddtl(BrNo,GameId,DrawId,KenoId,LotNam, TxnLog,TLogNo,CusNam,CrdNo,AwdAmt) SELECT b.BrNo,a.GameId,a.DrawId,a.KenoId,b.LotNam,a.TxnLog,a.TLogNo,b.CusNam,b.CrdNo,a.TotPrz FROM lotprzctl a,lottxnjnl b WHERE a.GameId='%s' and a.DrawId='%s' and a.KenoId='%s' and a.GameId=b.GameId and a.DrawId=b.DrawId and a.KenoId=b.KenoId and a.BigBon='false' and a.TxnLog=b.TxnLog and a.TLogNo=b.TLogNo and b.TxnSts in ('S','T') and b.AwdRtn='0'

DynSentence.name: UpdLotTxnJnl_AwdFlg
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lottxnjnl a SET a.AwdFlg='%s' WHERE a.GameId || a.DrawId || a.KenoId in (select b.GameId || b.DrawId || b.KenoId from lotprzctl b where b.GameId='%s' and b.DrawId='%s' and b.KenoId='%s' and a.TxnLog=b.TxnLog and b.BigBon='false') and a.TxnSts in ('S','T')

DynSentence.name: UpdLotTxnJnl_AwdRtn
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lottxnjnl SET AwdRtn='%s' WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s' and TxnLog='%s'

DynSentence.name: QryPrzAmt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CAST(AwdAmt AS BIGINT)),0) PrzAmt FROM lotawddtl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdLotDrwTbl_PrzAmt
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotdrwtbl SET PrzAmt='%s' WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s'

DynSentence.name: QryXfeFlg
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT XfeFlg OXfeFlg FROM LotDrwTbl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s'

DynSentence.name: Chk_CrpAgr
DynSentence.Sentence: select BBusTyp,TActNo from savcrpagr where CAgtNo='%s' and SvrSts='1'

DynSentence.name: QryLotDrwTbl_PrzAmt
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT PrzAmt FROM lotdrwtbl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s'

DynSentence.name: UpdLotDrwTbl_PayFlg
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotdrwtbl SET PayFlg='%s',PayAmt='%s',XfeFlg='%s' WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s'

DynSentence.name: QryLotAwdDtl
DynSentence.Sentence: SELECT CusNam,CrdNo,AwdAmt,TxnLog FROM lotawddtl WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s' and AwdRtn='0' and HTxnSt not in ('S','T','X','F')

DynSentence.name: UpdLotAwdDtl
DynSentence.Sentence: UPDATE lotawddtl SET AwdRtn='%s',TxnCod='%s',HTxnCd='%s',HLogNo='%s',HRspCd='%s',HTxnSt='%s',AwdDat='%s',AwdTim='%s',TckNo='%s',LogNo='%s' WHERE GameId='%s' and DrawId='%s' and KenoId='%s' and TxnLog='%s'
